title: Apple Inc. Update
content: Apple's stock rose by 2.3% today after announcing a new AI partnership. 分析师认为其在端侧 AI (On-device AI) 的布局将带动 iPhone 17 的换机潮。Target price adjusted to $245.50.

title: Tesla Momentum
content: Tesla's Giga Berlin reached a new production milestone of 6,000 cars per week. 尽管存在交付压力，但 FSD V13 的发布提振了投资者信心。Current market cap stands at $850.4 billion.

title: 贵州茅台公告
content: Kweichow Moutai reported a steady dividend payout ratio. 预计 2025 年现金分红比例不低于 75%。The company continues to dominate the premium Baijiu market in China. 机构维持 '买入' 评级。

title: NVIDIA Earnings Preview
content: NVIDIA is expected to report Q4 revenue of $32.5 billion. 市场关注其 Blackwell 芯片的量产进度。AI demand remains insatiable globally. 只要毛利率保持在 75% 以上，股价仍有上行空间。
